Title: 37061 - Bring Your Company to Life Through Sensory Branding
Direction: 500 words: Discuss 3-6 qualities of sensory branding and how they can help a company and their branding. Sensory branding is a very interesting and effective way to engage a customer. It appeals to all of their senses and is unique in how it is conceived and executed. Talk about some of the qualities of sensory branding and why it is effective. You can mention the client link by discussing the impact of visual branding and how there are companies that excel at bringing the visual branding to life. Your target audience is people that are tech savvy as well as business owners.
